reasoning: Umbrella term including Alzheimer's disease, vascular dementia, and other forms. Alzheimer's Disease International 2005 estimated 7.7 million new dementia cases globally per year, approximately 118 per 100k person-years. Strong epidemiological data.
source: Ferri CP et al. (2005). Global prevalence of dementia: a Delphi consensus study. Lancet. 366(9503):2112-2117
